$eref.description: Module deployment information. There are two modes: deployment managed by Okapi (with nodeId specified) and remote module (with URL specified).
$eref.title: DeploymentDescriptor

___url.description: URL where module is deployed (not managed by Okapi)

___instId.description: Instance ID (at least unique for node)

___srvcId.description: The Module ID for the instance

___nodeId.description: Node ID where module is deployed
